title: "3 Covid passengers from Delhi, Kolkata prompt Hong Kong to ban AI flights till April 24"
excerpt: "Hong Kong has banned Air India services from Kolkata and Delhi till April 24 after three passengers on one of its flights tested positive for COVID-19 post arrival on Saturday, a senior government official has said."
